unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer immense value. Dr. Sharma's work on Kapil Dev's journey is inspiring. Understanding their struggles, like P.T. Usha's, motivates youngsters. Imagine living in a 500 sq ft Mumbai chawl and dreaming of Olympic gold! Rs. 5 lakh for training seems paltry now. These stories from IIT Delhi alumni to Ranji Trophy players need wider reach. More on Dhyan Chand's hockey magic, please.
normalised: Athlete biographies offer immense value. Doctor Sharma's work on K A P I L D E V's journey is inspiring. Understanding their struggles, like P T Usha's, motivates youngsters. Imagine living in a five hundred square feet Mumbai chawl and dreaming of Olympic gold! Rupee five lakh for training seems paltry now.
